Back to the list

Forms

Forms have different components. Since Fajny does not use JavaScript some components can not be properly designed. An error text is already coded, but you would have to use a JS form checker.

File to include

@include "components/forms";

Inputs

Email is required
Email must be a valid email address
<div class="input-container">
    <input type="text" id="input1" name="input" required />
    <span class="bar"></span>
    <label for="input1">Email</label>
    <div class="error">
            <div>Email is required</div>
            <div>Email must be a valid email address</div>
    </div>
</div>

Inputs with icon

<div class="input-container input-icon-container">
    <input type="text" id="input2" name="input" required />
    <span class="bar"></span>
    <label for="input2">Search</label>
</div>

Inputs with two icons

<div class="input-container input-double-icon-container">
    <input type="text" id="input3" name="input" required />
    <span class="bar"></span>
    <label for="input3">Search</label>
</div>

Inputs disabled

<div class="input-container">
    <input type="text" id="input4" required disabled />
    <span class="bar"></span>
    <label for="input4">Email</label>
</div>

Textarea

Message is required
<div class="input-container">
    <textarea name="" id="textarea" name="" required></textarea>
    <span class="bar"></span>
    <label for="textarea">Your message</label>
    <div class="error">
            <div>Message is required</div>
    </div>
</div>

Select

<div class="select-container">
    <select>
            <option value="value1">Label 1</option>
            <option value="value2">Label 2</option>
            <option value="value3">Label 3</option>
            <option value="value4">Label 4</option>
    </select>
</div>

Radio buttons

<div class="radio-container">
    <input type="radio" id="radio1" name="radio" checked />
    <label for="radio1" class="radio-label"></label>
    <label for="radio1" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

<div class="radio-container">
    <input type="radio" id="radio2" name="radio" />
    <label for="radio2" class="radio-label"></label>
    <label for="radio2" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

<div class="radio-container">
    <input type="radio" id="radio3" name="radio-disabled" disabled checked />
    <label for="radio3" class="radio-label"></label>
    <label for="radio3" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

<div class="radio-container">
    <input type="radio" id="radio4" name="radio-disabled" disabled />
    <label for="radio4" class="radio-label"></label>
    <label for="radio4" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

Checkboxes

<div class="checkbox-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1" name="checkbox" checked />
    <label for="checkbox1" class="checkbox-label"></label>
    <label for="checkbox1" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>
<div class="checkbox-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox2" name="checkbox" />
    <label for="checkbox2" class="checkbox-label"></label>
    <label for="checkbox2" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

<div class="checkbox-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox3" name="checkbox" disabled checked />
    <label for="checkbox3" class="checkbox-label"></label>
    <label for="checkbox3" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

<div class="checkbox-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox4" name="checkbox" disabled />
    <label for="checkbox4" class="checkbox-label"></label>
    <label for="checkbox4" class="text-label">Label</label>
</div>

Toggle switches

<div class="toggle-switch-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="toggle1" name="toggle" checked />
    <label for="toggle1" class="toggle-label"></label>
    <label for="toggle1" class="label-text">Label</label>
</div>
<div class="toggle-switch-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="toggle2" name="toggle" />
    <label for="toggle2" class="toggle-label"></label>
    <label for="toggle2" class="label-text">Label</label>
</div>
<div class="toggle-switch-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="toggle3" name="toggle" disabled checked />
    <label for="toggle3" class="toggle-label"></label>
    <label for="toggle3" class="label-text">Label</label>
</div>
<div class="toggle-switch-container">
    <input type="checkbox" id="toggle4" name="toggle" disabled />
    <label for="toggle4" class="toggle-label"></label>
    <label for="toggle4" class="label-text">Label</label>
</div>
